Runner

public Runner(Model owner,
              java.lang.String name,
              boolean showInTrace,
              int number,
              double speed,
              double accuracy)
Constructor of the runner process Used to create a new runner.

Parameters:
owner - the model this process belongs to
name - this runner's name
showInTrace - flag to indicate if this process shall produce output for the trace
number - this runner number.
speed - this runner average speed.
accuracy - ths runner average accuracy.
